price: Оё [кофирон] ба шутур наменигаранд, ки чи гуна офарида шудааст?
arabic: أَفَلَا يَنظُرُونَ إِلَى ٱلۡإِبِلِ كَيۡفَ خُلِقَتۡ

version.title: Tajik translation - Arfy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Tajik by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: afalā yanẓurūna ilā al-ibili kayfa khuliqat
